descriptionHtml:
I noticed that gold appears as a miscellaneous item and thought it would likely be very easy to give it some weight, a tweak that was *relatively* desired in Oblivion (for which the implementation was much more complicated, I believe). So, as my first little mod for Skyrim, I give you weighted gold.

Each coin weighs 0.01 units, so 100 coins is one unit. This means that its displayed weight is 0, due to the game only displaying one digit past the radix point.
author: ishmaeltheforsaken and Oscar Wilde

files.name: Ishs Weighted Gold
files.changelogHtml: fixed sound bug; there should be NO outstanding issues now :); re-packed files to be more BAIN-friendly
